<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Drunkard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=946)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Every tavern has one—that person who drinks a little too much and starts a fight. While many drunkards are relatively harmless, a few have a hair trigger, and when they're set off come, no one—even the drunkard themself—can tell you what started the row.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Publican_Drunkard.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Drunkard](/NPCs.aspx?ID=946)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 239</row>

**Perception** +6

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Alcohol Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +3, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
drunkard's outfit (functions as [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=3)), [pewter mug](/Equipment.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 40

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pewter mug +8 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Drunken Rage** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Requirements** The drunkard is drunk, and isn't [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or raging; **Effect** Something sets the drunkard off, causing them to fly into a drunken rage. They gain 6 temporary Hit Points that last until the drunken rage ends. While raging, they deal 4 additional damage with melee attacks and take a -1 penalty to AC. The drunkard can't use [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) actions except [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) and [rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135) actions. The rage lasts for 1 minute or until the drunkard falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) or sobers up. The drunkard can't voluntarily stop the Drunken Rage. Once the rage ends, the drunkard can't Rage again for 1 minute.

</column>

name: Drunkard
